text: Yeh log kehtay hain kay hum to sirf chand roz jahannum mein rahen gay inn say kaho kay kiya tumharay pass Allah Taalaa ka koi parwana hai? Agar hai to yaqeenan Allah Taalaa apney waday kay khilaf nahi keray ga (hergiz nahi) bulkay tum to Allah kay zimmay woh baaten lagatay ho jinhen tum nahi jantay
